website_summaries.verdict: The Verve is Anker’s affordable and great-sounding solution for anyone who’d prefer to keep their phone tucked safely away in their pocket when they’re on the go.
pros: Includes multiple silicone ear tips for the perfect fit
Pause music and answer incoming calls with corded remote and microphone
cons: Some users have reported issues with operating this device on their Apple iPhone

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted a pair of headphones that sounded good and also had a microphone that I could use to make phone calls. I tried a $100 pair of Sennheiser headphones, but I found a number of problems with it. Those were too heavy and the angled plug made it impossible to use with my phone while it was in a case. These pair, in contrast, cost far less and work and sound great. I couldnt be happier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good headphones. They seem to work well and are as good of quality as anything else Anker. (which I am a fan of) I wouldn't say they are fantastic headphones with tons of clarity or bass response. BUT...If you're looking for some beater cans to mow the yard or go to the gym, these are fine. Don't expect Shure, AKG, or even Bose quality out these. When you break or lose them you won't shed any tears over the $16 loss. Just pick up another pair. Anker will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: captaingnome

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Moderate Price
customer_reviews.text: Recently I've been buying just about anything that is Anker brands. They simply make high quality products at a low to moderate price range. These headphones are no different. Quality construction. They sound good. The cables are high quality. They come with a lot of different size buds. They also come with a high quality little pouch case that I didn't even know would be in there.
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Impressive budget earbuds!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price is excellent, for me, with the built-in mic and button,much better. Very comfortable(doesn't hurt my ears) and lightweight. I didn't made a stress test with the cable because I'm a guy that taking care of any accessory is top priority, but for rough users who like to bend, chew, whatever you want to do to the earbuds, is recommended for you. I would like to see from Anker a version 2 of this earbuds featuring not 1 button controller, but 3 button controller(play/pause, vol +, vol -), but overall, it is a great earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Q.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ear Buds I’ve Owned. Great sound all around.
customer_reviews.text: ANKER has done it again !!! I had been using Skull Candy that are not bad ear buds, but these ANKER Verve ear buds have BLOWN AWAY any other ear buds I’ve owned. Crystal Clear Highs and Incredible Base comes through for pure music enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service, terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I actually got two of these, one with the mic and one without and both of them only lasted about a month. EDIT- Though the original products I purchased didn't last very long the company did offer a replacement for the defective product, so they do have good customer service. EDIT- The replacement lasted only one day so I decided to drop my review down to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gerald McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good sound quality, all things considered
customer_reviews.text: This have surprisingly VERY good sound quality. I'm a bit of an audiophile (usually I spring for a ~$100 pair of earbuds) and these are actually ON PAR with some of the Sony/Bose earbuds I've used. The sound quality might be slightly worse but for $16? Honestly a steal so far. Time will tell if they actually last more than a month, but honestly the sound quality is good enough that I wouldnt mind spending the $16 again if these happen to break sometime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: but there are much better quality earbuds for this price
customer_reviews.text: I was just gonna blame myself for being cheap and buying these, but there are much better quality earbuds for this price. Cheap quality, lots of bass but not the deep bass i was looking for, just loud and annoying. Treble is terrible. i expected much better build quality from Anker, cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Airline quality earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is decent. The craftsmanship is poor. Within a month, the cover came off of the volume bar. And less than one month of daily use, the earbud has detached from the volume bar.
customer_reviews.author: nu-nu's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long...
customer_reviews.text: Anker was originally recommended to me, but in regard to phone chargers. I did buy two Anker chargers, and was extremely impressed by their superior quality. So I branched out, and took a chance buying these as a backup for my wireless earbuds. Bad choice. Although they sounded great while they lasted, they only made it two weeks before the cord started separating from the right earbud. It began affecting the sound by week three, and at that point it was too late to return them to Amazon. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: K. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Wire breaks near joints.
customer_reviews.text: They should remove below line from product description. The wire joining the left headphone broke and now only rightside is working. 【Flexible Durability】Connected by an extra-tough wire designed to withstand over 15000 bends.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for an Anker product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Anker products. Buy 1 cable and use it forever without issue. These though, only lasted 3 months before the connections from the cable to the ear buds failed. I've lost other brands before they broken but I usually had them at least 6 months and they didn't fail. Won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Zulick

customer_reviews.title: Best Buds for Years
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound quality of these and the ability to control them from the button. Had them for two years before I put them through the washing machine in the pocket of my scrubs and the one ear still sounds just as great and the button still works. The right earbud past the control button doesn't work anymore and I haven't tried the mic yet but I'm way impressed regardless. I love clutz-proof anything. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Talbeezy

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These things simply FAIL. Im in business and I used these for conference calls on several occasions. Each time, the other participants could not hear me, and I had to remove the earphones. I was speaking directly into the mic each time. Anker usually has amazing products, but this one is a FAIL.
customer_reviews.author: Mega Matt

customer_reviews.title: Anker.... what a company!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good stuff about them. They simply rock. These earbuds are great! They sound awesome (better than the $50 set I own), look good, and appear to be well made. I was really happy to see Anker get into this market.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Giid sound, Improve the wires!
customer_reviews.text: I use earphones A LOT! On average about 20hrs a day. Yes, I listen to music or audiobooks to sleep. Sound was good. The wires get "work-hardened in about 3 weeks! Bummer😣. Needs work on materials to keep flexibility in wires. FYI, my Bose pair had the same problem and cost $$$!!
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Teche Belle

customer_reviews.title: great earbuds, small BT delay
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with these earbuds is that there's a small delay between my phone and the earbuds. It's most noticeable when gaming. Otherwise: good battery life, good sound, good fit, easy to pair and use.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: Basic Wired Ear Set
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a back-up to my Bluetooth Anker ear buds for PHONE conversations. Works just fine, price was great, and Anker is a reputable company. Voice quality on both sidess of phone conversation are good.
customer_reviews.author: 007Magnum

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great sound, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Anker products and this one is no exception. These wireless earbuds are far less expensive than the competition but produce excellent sound quality, charge quickly, and last for hours before needing another charge. I like the magnetic back of each bud that holds them together to prevent tangles when not in use. Very high quality product that I'm happy to have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Jack wore down?
customer_reviews.text: Was very delighted initially with this purchase. I liked the sound quality (was not looking for earth-shattering sound from an ear bud) and sturdy wire. i have purchased a number of Anker products and have always felt the quality and value were top notch. Felt the same way about these at first, but after a couple of months, the jack kept coming out of my phone as if it got "stripped" - and not after a tremendous amount of usage. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphone!! I used it just for 2months and jack bent so I contacted with seller which is anker. She asked my address and shipped it right away and I was told that I have 18months of warranty on it. Love the quality of sound and comfortable as well. Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive buds
customer_reviews.text: I have a habit of buying all kinds of low dollar ear buds and have a few dozen different brands kicking around. These have the clearest audio (to me) of all I have tried so far. I liked them so much I bought five of them to have at home desk, work desk, bed room, living room, and daily carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Reu

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, heavy duty cords don't tangle
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones ever ... so far. Usually hate reviews that say "I just got these ...", but I did, and here are my first impressions: 1. They sound great! 2. They fit comfortably and have several sizes of rubber covers 3. Cord does not tangle, is heavier duty that average and, like other Anker cords, comes with a little velcro tab to wind the cord and keep it tidy for storage. 4. Simple carrying pouch with a pinch opener I'll update as necessary
customer_reviews.author: Susbear

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: I don't consider myself to be an audiophile, but I do enjoy music and I've bought dozens of pairs of headphones and earbuds over the years. These are among the best earbuds that I've ever heard at this price point. I find myself going back through old playlists just to see how old favorites will sound on these. These are a great value. If you're in the market for some cheap earbuds with good sound, give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: It's good.  Just need better material
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months from purchase and heavy usage of the earphones (consisting of listening to music, working out, and walking doggo), the material stiffened up. The right earphone gave out. With the stiffening, the wire became exposed. Mic buttons still work, just the earbud stopped working from the material hardening.
customer_reviews.author: Nam Kim

customer_reviews.title: Trash-phones
customer_reviews.text: These are not headphones. These are trash-phones. The sound was thin and metallic. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: R R

customer_reviews.title: You can trust this one!
customer_reviews.text: No matter what does Anker, you can be pretty sure they'll do it right! if not, they will fix it in the best way. I really love Anker products!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Amarante

customer_reviews.title: Tinny, metallic sound.  A plug-in migraine.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, NO Volume Control. Sound is very metallic, tinny like an old toy piano. If you like listening to a kid at the end of a metal tunnel banging on metal pots and pans, these are for you. For me it sounded like a power drill driving into my brain.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves them
customer_reviews.text: We have several Anker products. I use the wireless headphones but my wife loves these because she can use them laying down.
customer_reviews.author: dionisio

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: i just wish i didnt lose them. The sound is better than earbuds ive tried twice the price. anker makes great stuff, ive never been dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren s

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good for the money. Listeningto music they have good tone and bass but not great sound. Good to talk on, microphone works well during conversation.
customer_reviews.author: shane b

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for 6 months and they still work great. I prefer the apple style plastic to the rubber in ear style these have, but these are some of the best rubber ones I’ve gotten. Fancy ones like bose shut out noise too much, these don’t so much.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Not to durable
customer_reviews.text: So these earvuds sound great the only problem is that with a small drop on a hard surface already broke one earbud. The good thing is that the product includes a 18 months of protection. Lasted less than 48 hours
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: When they work - they are great
customer_reviews.text: Headphones broke after a few days of use - when they were working, they were pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I have to turn the aux to hear sound
customer_reviews.text: They worked well for a month, but now I have to turn the aux input thing to a certain angle to hear anything, sometimes it only works on one side.Should have got Panasonic
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Srugo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for having a cheap pair of ear buds. Sound quality is fine. I've had them for a couple months now and they are still working.
customer_reviews.author: ohfred

customer_reviews.title: Reliable headphones
customer_reviews.text: Anker makes good products. There is a slight noise interference when the wire rubs but the construction quality and sound quality otherwise is great
customer_reviews.author: Nick Capella

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, reasonable price. Anker quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good. Blocks out extraneous noise. Good price. Well made. Right angle jack keeps the cord from getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Great Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: As far as wired earbuds under $25 go these are probably the best I have ever used. I use them for business phone calls with my computer and phone and to listen to music on my computer. The bass is perfect and the sound is super clear.
customer_reviews.author: RobM

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are a pleasure to use. They pair easily the first time and every time and stay connected. The sound quality is good both with music and phone conversations. I haven't had any complaints from people I'm speaking with so I assume the microphone works also.
customer_reviews.author: DRF

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, good quality, nice sound earbuds
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to complaint about these. They simply work, and for the price is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Best budget earphones in the market
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a under $30 earphones this are the pefect. They look and feel like a very expensive product, sounds is great, also is noise cancelling. I bought them for travel and is blocked all the airplane noise!!. Perfect Anker always doing great products.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto FG

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be ok
customer_reviews.text: They seem nice.will see in a minth and write a review then. The sound is ok.
customer_reviews.author: BarefootMama

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cancel noise very well. Quality build and materials. Sound is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for cost, not great
customer_reviews.text: Loud noises cause the audio to skip, and the connection at the base by the jack is fragile, moving or bumping it will often cause audio to pause or sound to be lost. I bought two pairs and both did this, though one is much worse than the other
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have bought several
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing sounded and super convenient. Own several pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Pippin

customer_reviews.title: Real Sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound reproduction and quality is great. They are some of the best I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Frogboy

customer_reviews.title: Work great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great at Boise cancelling and excellent sound. Haven’t had them long so I can’t attest to durability, but the cord seems extra thick so it seems likely they will last longer than other ones I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ray Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these earphone, fit nicely, sound is great, can't believe all this for that low price. You gotta try them.
customer_reviews.author: yg

customer_reviews.title: Large and heavy for ears
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and well constructed! But did not fit my ears. I am a fan of Anker and I thought these would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kubo

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones get the job done—great sound, stable construction, and aesthetically pleasing. Would recommend to anyone who wants a no-frills option without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Must have wired headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, I use them for work and on airplanes for the movies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone I've gotten
customer_reviews.text: They are durable and will last a long time. Great sound
customer_reviews.author: Dirtydan

customer_reviews.title: Well built and durable but just don't sound good.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and just overall weak sounding earbuds. Can get miles better earbuds for 10 dollars at Walmart. Very dissapointing especially from anker
customer_reviews.author: Dawson Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, and long cord just what I needed to listen to music dvds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable. Had to throw away.
customer_reviews.text: They broke! Not durable for wearing around town. Good sound. I guess they are a typical throw-away product that amazon is all about.
customer_reviews.author: shughesp

customer_reviews.title: Heavy bass earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Love these ear buds. Anker has never disappointed and these sound way better than store-bought earbuds and apple ear phones as well
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Franco

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: For as little as they cost these are really good headphones with a really good mic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I think these are very good headphones for people that are prone to damaging theirs. Very durable. Have had them for 3 months now, and so far so good. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Foltz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and it has some good base. Best headphones for the money
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been loving Anker for over 2 years now and These earbuds sound fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: They’re great
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a month normally a set of headphones last me about a week
customer_reviews.author: Dick johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great cable
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of the cable. And also love how they sound. I am always happy with Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Seriously recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best headphones I have ever had for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Anker Verve is the best earbuds on the planet Earth.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these headphones and I suggest them over all headphones out as far as earbuds go these are the KING for any earbuds that are 100 dollars or less you can not do any better than this. Anker has top quality sound all the time. I use rap chat application which uses a microphone and have recorded over 200 songs with the Skullcandy headphones all varieties you can go listen for yourself my vocals are clearer and more understandable with top clarity out of the Verve Ankers. My latest recording on there you can hear the crickets clearly in the background as I am outside at night recording.
customer_reviews.author: Ziplok

customer_reviews.title: This headphones deliver much for quality and performance for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This headphones deliver much for quality and performance for the money. If they were selling $29.99, I would get them.
customer_reviews.author: Erdenetsogt Uvgunburged

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sound is good, as well the customers' service
customer_reviews.author: angry Ma

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for better from Anker
customer_reviews.text: Product fell apart after a couple of months. I was hoping for better from Anker.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Came out of the box not working
customer_reviews.text: I love Anker. I do, but I cannot give anything above a 1 star. The earphones I was sent were broken. They don't work. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Mic is awful.
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds reproduce sound good enough. The mic is terrible. It picks up all surrounding noise. People calling me hated it. In response to an email, support says the mic is not noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else will go in my ears except for these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've said it once and I'll say it again Anker cannot make a bad product. I was hooked on the quality and craftsmanship of their product when I first purchased a cell phone charger. After that I became hooked on anything they had to offer
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Good for first few days....
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, you can definitely hear the bass and it stays in my ears nicely. However, after few days, it started to do its own thing. I was listening music while working and it would stop and play music. It would turn Siri on and off.
customer_reviews.author: a_rebel

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent Anker product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? If you want the best bang for your buck, it's hard to beat Anker. These headphones like all their products have top flight fit and finish. Made from excellent materials, and have more than adequate sound reproduction.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Feenman

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Eardbuds
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today and they sound great for the price. The actual earbud housing is pretty small which i didnt realize until i tried them. Not a problem for my ears but i dont know how this'll fair for other peoples ears. Ill update this review if i find anything negative about them but so far id say this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Only one side works after only three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Welp.... You really get what you pay for here. I imagine there are some quality issues with anything that is this inexpensive so I'll just say they worked great up until they didn't. Left earbud goes in and out. Possible short in the wiring, but at least I still have the right earbud.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

product_meta.title: Anker SoundBuds Verve Earphones with Microphone, Wired Headphones
feature_bullets: 【Enhanced soundpowerful 10mm Composite drivers deliver impressive audio with clear highs and powerful bass.
【Flexible durabilityconnected by an extra-tough wire designed to withstand over 15000 bends.
【Block It outnoise-isolating design effectively reduces external sound allowing you to focus on your music.
【Convenient callsbuilt-in remote with microphone for answering calls.
【What's in the boxsoundbuds Verve, XS/S/M/L/XL ear tips, carry pouch, Our 18-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,495 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
